event.title: Innovative Lab Made Diamond Pendants (Workshop)
event.description:
The world is changing. To be successful, jewelers have also no right to delaying transformations and they think innovatively too. Join the celebration of new design ideas.

From the very beginning, jewelry was the element of spirituality. It reflects human values, beliefs, life conceptions. These notions are not stable across the years; they are transformed under the influence of new challenges, social transformations, and developmental changes. Apparently, today jewelry should be a little different than that one we could observe a century or even a decade ago.

Being aware of this fact, Istoria Jewellers challenged the young professionals, including jewelers and designers, with the call to craft a special collection reflecting the most popular tendencies and social trends. The most progressive young creators crafted an incredibly innovative diamond jewelry pieces. Using new approaches and new technologies, they have embodied all the facets of the modern age in their works.

These days you can observe the results â€“ significantly new crafted pendants. Hurry up to see these unique diamond items.
